xxl.core.indexStructures
Class RTree.Node.Distribution

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.RTree.Node.Distribution
Enclosing class:
RTree.Node
protected class RTree.Node.Distribution
extends Object

Distribution is the class used to represent the distribution of entries of a node of the RTree into two partitions used for a split.

Field Summary
protected  int dim
          Number of dimensions.
protected  Object[] entries
          Entries stored in this distribution.
protected  Rectangle firstDescriptor
          Bounding Rectangle of the first part of the distribution.
protected  Rectangle secondDescriptor
          Bounding Rectangle of the first part of the distribution.
protected  int secondStart
          Start index of the second part of the distribution.
 
Constructor Summary

Method Summary

          Returns the sum of the areas of the two partitions.
protected  Descriptor descriptor(boolean second)
          Returns a descriptor of one of the partitions of this distribution.
protected  List entries(boolean second)
          Returns one of the partitions of this distribution.
protected  int getDim()
          Returns the number of dimenssions.
protected  double marginValue()
          Returns the sum of the margins of the two partitions.
protected  double overlapValue()
          Returns the overlap of the two partitions.

protected RTree.Node.Distribution(Object[] entries,
                                  int secondStart,
                                  Rectangle firstDescriptor,

                                  int dim)
Parameters:
entries - an array containing all entries to be distributed
secondStart - the start index of the second partition
firstDescriptor - the descriptor for the first partition
secondDescriptor - the descriptor for the second partition
dim - the number of dimensions
Method Detail

entries

protected List entries(boolean second)
Returns one of the partitions of this distribution.

Parameters:
second - a boolean value determining if the second partition should be returned
Returns:
the entries of the first (if second == false) or of the second partition (if second == true)

descriptor

protected Descriptor descriptor(boolean second)
Returns a descriptor of one of the partitions of this distribution.

Parameters:
second - a boolean value determining if the descriptor of second partition should be returned
Returns:
the descriptor of the first (if second == false) or of the second partition (if second == true)
